question: Which IT partners are most commonly associated with companies that reported a strategic pivot in their tech stack over the last six months?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that reported a strategic pivot in their tech stack in the last six months. [CompanyTechStack]
Gather IT partner details associated with those companies. [CompanyITPartnerDetail]
Analyze the IT partner data to find the most commonly associated partners. [CompanyITPartnerDetail]
